content.description: Parsing text in a deterministic way means the same input always produces the same parse tree. No ambiguity in interpretation, no random choices in resolution.
content.title: Deterministic Parsing

content.description: The process of breaking text into smaller units (tokens) such as words, punctuation, or subwords. Fundamental preprocessing step for natural language processing.
content.title: Tokenization

content.description: In English, the subject and verb must agree in number. Singular subjects take singular verbs, plural subjects take plural verbs.
content.title: Subject-Verb Agreement
